member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_HEVC
member.summary: Represents encoder codec configuration support for HEVC encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_HEVC.SupportFlags
member.summary: A bitwise OR combination of flags from the specifying which optional features are supported for the codec.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_HEVC.MinLumaCodingUnitSize
member.summary: The minimum luma coding block size requested. This value must match what the caller will code in the sequence parameter set (SPS).

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_HEVC.MaxLumaCodingUnitSize
member.summary: The maximum luma coding block size requested. This value matches what the user will code in SPS.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_HEVC.MinLumaTransformUnitSize
member.summary: The minimum luma transform block size requested. This value matches the pixel size of what the user will code in SPS.log2_min_luma_transform_block_size_minus2.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_HEVC.MaxLumaTransformUnitSize
member.summary: The maximum luma transform block size requested. This value must be consistent with the pixel size the user will code in SPS.log2_diff_max_min_luma_transform_block_size. The variable MaxTbLog2SizeY is set equal to log2_min_luma_transform_block_size_minus2 + 2 + log2_diff_max_min_luma_transform_block_size.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_HEVC.max_transform_hierarchy_depth_inter
member.summary: The maximum hierarchy depth for transform units of coding units coded in inter prediction mode. The value of max_transform_hierarchy_depth_inter shall be in the range of 0 to CtbLog2SizeY − MinTbLog2SizeY, inclusive.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_HEVC.max_transform_hierarchy_depth_intra
member.summary: Specifies the maximum hierarchy depth for transform units of coding units coded in intra prediction mode. The value of max_transform_hierarchy_depth_intra shall be in the range of 0 to CtbLog2SizeY − MinTbLog2SizeY, inclusive.
